5602.quoteText: The Services use cookies and similar technologies such as pixel tags, web beacons, clear GIFs, JavaScript, and local storage.
5602.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

tosdr.tldr: The Brilliant Cookie Policy states, "The Services use cookies and similar technologies such as pixel tags, web beacons, clear GIFs, JavaScript, and local storage."

5604.quoteText:
Brilliant reserves the right, at its sole discretion, to modify or replace any of the terms or conditions of this Agreement at any time.

5605.quoteText: Our Services do not support Do Not Track requests at this time, which means that we collect information about your online activity both while you are using the Services and after you leave the Services
5605.title: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.
